sponsor: Beijing Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine Bureau
briefTitle: Clinical Trial of Traditional Chinese Diaoshi Jifa Therapy of Meniere's Disease
officialTitle: A Random Controlled Clinical Trial:l Traditional Chinese Diaoshi Jifa Therapy of Meniere's Disease

interventions.name: Diaoshi Jifa therapy plus the Western medical treatment.
otherNames: Western medical treatment: Ginkgo 20 ml qd iv, Merision 6mg tid po

interventions.name: drug
otherNames: Western medical treatment: Ginkgo 20 ml qd iv, Merision 6mg tid po

summary: The hypothesis of this study is that DiaoShi Jifa reduces the symptoms, such as dizziness in patients with Meniere's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Dizziness Handicap Inventory (DHI) Questionnaire Score
